metadata.title: EARTEC UL4S Ultralite 4-Person Headset System (USA) with 6Ave Heaphone and Microphone Cleaning Kit
features: BUNDLE INCLUDES: Eartec UL4S UltraLITE 4-Person Headset System (USA), 6Ave Heaphone Cleaning Kit, Microphone Cleaning Kit and 1-Year Extended Warranty
HANDS-FREE: The Eartec UL2S wireless headsets operate on 1.9 GHz frequency to avoid interference with other devices while also allowing for simultaneous communication for 4 users

OUTSTANDING PERFORMANCE: With up to 1,000 ft LOS wireless range, 6 hours of talk time on a single charge and a pivoting microphone allows for the headsets to be worn on either left or right side, you'll likely find no headset that is comparable!
GREAT CLARITY: Noise-cancelling microphone that automatically mutes when pivoted upwards; high-quality voice communication even in high-noise environments
PERFECT FOR: video production, stage production, boat operators, drone operators, construction sites and more.
description: The Eartec UL4S UltraLITE 4-Person Headset System includes one UltraLITE Single Master headset, three UltraLITE Single Remote headset, four batteries, an eight-port charger, and a medium soft-side case. It is designed to accommodate four-person crews who need to communicate wirelessly while simultaneously working with their hands. It's intended for use in the United States.
